events.name: SOLDIER_SPAWN_RATE
events.comment: Soldiers created in one spawn. The frequency of spawning will be constant throughout the game, ie. every 0.5 seconds, 5 soldiers are spawned

events.text:
Things done till now:
Dragging from one zone to other to spawn soldiers
spawning of soldiers in the correct batch size
Basic player properties

Things to do next:
Add animations (not frames) to zones and soldiers for different colors
Soldier reaching destination zone and resulting logics (different logics if destination is neutral, friendly or enemy)
Logic for autogenerating soldiers in zones
